name: A SINGLE FURNITURE // FURNITURE SONGS
description:
## SOUND ON ##

First song and Single of the album "Furniture Songs", composed by Gabriel Politzer; sound artist, musician and biologist from Rio de Janeiro.

The composition originates in his apartment, near Av. Paulista in the city of São Paulo, in the apocalyptic and chaotic context of the pandemic in Brazil. Despite this scenario, "A Single Furniture" brings the listener an atmosphere of cozy, relaxing and hopeful retreat that can be enjoyed along with everyday activities such as working, studying, doing the dishes or cleaning the house.
The process of creation and production was minimalist, done only with a laptop, a headset and a lot of research on musical theory. Inspired by the DIY culture, "A Single Furniture" shows that virtually anyone can create their sounds without the need for expensive and specific equipment and hard work.

Track: 1 of 6
Genres: Chill-Out, Ambient, Lo-Fi
Art: @pixillian
Master: Rodrigo Paschoal
Release Date: Apr 23, 2021
